是.definition: to be (followed by substantives only); correct; right; true; (respectful acknowledgement of a command) very well; (adverb for emphatic assertion)

是不是.definition: is or isn't; yes or no; whether or not

是可忍，孰不可忍.pinyin: shi4 ke3 ren3 , shu2 bu4 ke3 ren3
是可忍，孰不可忍.definition: if this can be tolerated, what cannot? (idiom); enough is enough

是否.definition: whether (or not); if; is or isn't

是味兒.definition: (of food) to have the right taste; (of people) to feel at ease

是的.definition: yes, that's right; variant of 似的[shi4 de5]

是荷.definition: (written) (at the end of a request in letters) I would be much obliged

是藥三分毒.definition: every medicine has its side effect

是非不分.definition: unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)

是非曲直.definition: lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits; pros and cons

是非自有公論.pinyin: shi4 fei1 zi4 you3 gong1 lun4
是非自有公論.definition: to determine right and wrong based on public opinion (idiom); Public opinion will judge what's right and wrong.

是非莫辨.definition: unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)

是騾子是馬，拉出來遛遛.pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , la1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
是騾子是馬，拉出來遛遛.definition: see 是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛|是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛[shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5]

是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛.pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛.definition: lit. to see whether it's a mule or a horse, take it out for a walk (idiom); fig. the proof of the pudding is in the eating; to show what one is made of
